name: Delete connector fails for unprivileged user

error.reason: action [indices:data/write/xpack/connector/sync_job/delete] is unauthorized for user [entsearch-user] with effective roles [user] on indices [.elastic-connectors-sync-jobs-v1], this action is granted by the index privileges [write,all]
